name: {snugglebunny} note cards ~ perfect for kids
description:
share the joy of writing notes with kids!

note card set includes: 
* 8 personalized flat notecards with rounded corners 
* measure 4.25" x 5.5" 
* paired with brown (cappuccino-colored) square flap envelopes for a casual yet classic look 
* printed on quality paper (120 lb) with archival ink 

two ways to personalize the note cards: 
(1) email the name (exactly as you would like it to appear, including any capitalization, 24 character maximum) to info {at} tootstationery.com
(2) or include the information via "note to seller" link that appears during the payment process.

*shipping to US addresses - $2.50. 

{also}
*larger quantities available 
*design can be converted into a birth announcement
- please email info {at} tootstationery.com to inquire.

name: {flit and float} note cards ~ perfect for kids
description:
a joyful set of note cards.  perfect for kids and adults alike! 

note card set includes:
* 8 personalized flat notecards with rounded corners
* measure 4.25" x 5.5"
* paired with brown (cappuccino-colored) square flap envelopes for a casual yet classic look 
* printed on quality paper (120 lb) with archival ink
 
to personalize the note cards:
during the payment process, there will be an opportunity to add a "note to seller".  click on the link and in the comment box that appears, provide the desired name (exactly as you would like it to appear, including any capitalization, 24 character maximum) or email the name to info {at} tootstationery.com.

*shipping to US addresses - $2.50.  
*larger quantities available - please email info {at} tootstationery.com to inquire.
